Class BtceClientTradeApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.geeek.btce.BtceClientTradeApi

  • public class BtceClientTradeApi
extends Object
    A Java Client for BTC-e trade APIs.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Ludovic Toinel
    See Also:
    "https://btc-e.com/api/documentation"

        Returns:

      • authenticatedHTTPRequest

        private final net.sf.json.JSONObject authenticatedHTTPRequest(PrivateMethod method,
                                              Map<String,String> arguments)
                                                       throws BtceTechnicalException,
                                                              BtceFunctionalException
        Execute an HTTP query on the BTC-e private API.
        Parameters:
        method - The method to execute.
        arguments - The arguments to pass to the server.
        Returns:
        The returned data as JSON or null, if the request failed.
        Throws:
        BtceTechnicalException
        BtceFunctionalException
        See Also:
        "http://pastebin.com/K25Nk2Sv"

      • getTransactionHistory

        public Map<String,Order> getTransactionHistory(Long from,
                                      Long count,
                                      Long from_id,
                                      Long end_id,
                                      ListOrder order,
                                      Long since,
                                      Long end)
                                        throws BtceTechnicalException,
                                               BtceFunctionalException
        Get the BTC-e transaction history.
        Parameters:
        from - The number of the transaction to start displaying with.
        count - The number of transactions for displaying.
        from_id - The ID of the transaction to start displaying with.
        end_id - The ID of the transaction to finish displaying with.
        order - Sorting.
        since - When to start the displaying.
        end - When to finish the displaying.
        pair - The pair to show the transactions.
        Returns:
        The transaction history.
        Throws:
        IOException
        org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException
        org.codehaus.jackson.JsonParseException
        BtceTechnicalException
        BtceFunctionalException
